title: Update hero header H1 text to “ShiBhu”

requirements.text: Update the hero header H1 text at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[2]/h1[1] to display exactly “ShiBhu” (replacing the current text “Shivasankari Bhuvaneswaran”), without changing any other header content or styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The main hero header H1 displays exactly “ShiBhu”.
The tagline text, expertise tag pills, and all styling/layout of the header remain unchanged.
No other text elsewhere on the page is modified.

constraints: Apply the change ONLY to the selected element (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[2]/h1[1]).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change the tagline, expertise tags, navigation labels, or any other page copy.
Do not modify the visual theme, spacing, or typography beyond the H1 text content.
